name: NumberInput.Root
description: A field that allows user input of numeric values.
description_zh: A field that allows user input of numeric values.

allowMouseWheel.description: Whether to allow mouse wheel to change the value
allowMouseWheel.description_zh: 是否允许鼠标滚轮更改值

allowOverflow.description: Whether to allow the value overflow the min/max range
allowOverflow.description_zh: 是否允许值溢出 min/max 范围

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

clampValueOnBlur.description: Whether to clamp the value when the input loses focus (blur)
clampValueOnBlur.description_zh: 是否在输入失去焦点 （blur） 时限制该值

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the number input when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the number input.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次渲染时输入的数字的初始值。
当您不需要控制数字输入的状态时使用。

disabled.description: Whether the number input is disabled.

focusInputOnChange.description: Whether to focus input when the value changes
focusInputOnChange.description_zh: 值更改时是否聚焦输入

form.description: The associate form of the input element.
form.description_zh: input 元素的 associate 形式。

formatOptions.description: The options to pass to the `Intl.NumberFormat` constructor
formatOptions.description_zh: 要传递给 'Intl.NumberFormat' 构造函数的选项

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  input: string
  incrementTrigger: string
  decrementTrigger: string
  scrubber: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the number input. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 数字输入中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

inputMode.description:
Hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user. It also determines
the type of keyboard shown to the user on mobile devices
inputMode.description_zh:
提示用户可能输入的数据类型。它还确定
在移动设备上向用户显示的键盘类型

invalid.description: Whether the number input value is invalid.

locale.description: The current locale. Based on the BCP 47 definition.
locale.description_zh: 当前区域设置。基于 BCP 47 定义。

max.description: The maximum value of the number input

min.description: The minimum value of the number input

name.description: The name attribute of the number input. Useful for form submission.
name.description_zh: 数字输入的 name 属性。用于表单提交。

pattern.description: The pattern used to check the <input> element's value against
pattern.description_zh: 用于检查<input>元素值的模式

readOnly.description: Whether the number input is readonly

required.description: Whether the number input is required

spinOnPress.description: Whether to spin the value when the increment/decrement button is pressed
spinOnPress.description_zh: 是否在按下递增/递减按钮时旋转值

step.description: The amount to increment or decrement the value by
step.description_zh: 要递增或递减值的金额

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states
translations.description_zh: 指定标识辅助功能元素及其状态的本地化字符串

events.name: focusChange
events.description: Function invoked when the number input is focused
events.description_zh: 聚焦数字输入时调用的函数

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Function invoked when the value changes

events.name: valueInvalid
events.description: Function invoked when the value overflows or underflows the min/max range
events.description_zh: 当值溢出或下溢 min/max 范围时调用的函数
